name: Harlan Moss
personality: Polite but distant, always watching the road.
description: Harlan runs the front desk at the Novac Motel. He keeps track of every traveler who comes through — and every one who doesn’t leave.
questHooks: Mentions a guest who vanished without checking out.
Says someone has been leaving strange caps outside Room 12.
Heard a low hum coming from the motel’s old generator.
